title: Installation issue: flang [llvm-flang clang++ can't find libstdc++ from GCC@9.3.0]
body:
On our systems, installing `flang` fails because `clang++` from llvm-flang can't find libstdc++ when run through `cmake`.  Outside of `cmake` it can comfortably build C++ binaries.

<!-- Thanks for taking the time to report this build failure. To proceed with the report please:

1. Title the issue "Installation issue: <name-of-the-package>".
2. Provide the information required below.

We encourage you to try, as much as possible, to reduce your problem to the minimal example that still reproduces the issue. That would help us a lot in fixing it quickly and effectively! -->

### Steps to reproduce the issue

*(With a completely clean checkout of spack, cleared out ~/.spack etc)*

<!-- Fill in the exact spec you are trying to build and the relevant part of the error message -->
```console
$ spack install gcc@9.3.0
...
(load the gcc module)
$ spack compiler find
...
$ spack install flang%gcc@9.3.0
...
==> 3200: flang: Building flang [CMakePackage]
==> 3200: flang: Executing phase: 'cmake'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 1:
    'cmake' '-G' 'Unix Makefiles' '-DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX:STRING=/scratch/home/uccaoke/Source/spack-example/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-broadwell/gcc-9.3.0/flang-20190329-ie4mhecop3a2achd4ecmzz3ja7mlfyix' '-DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE:STRING=RelWithDebInfo' '-DCMAKE_VERBOSE_MAKEFILE:BOOL=ON' '-DCMAKE_INSTALL_RPATH_USE_LINK_PATH:BOOL=OFF' '-DCMAKE_INSTALL_RPATH:STRING=/scratch/home/uccaoke/Source/spack-example/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-broadwell/gcc-9.3.0/flang-20190329-ie4mhecop3a2achd4ecmzz3ja7mlfyix/lib;/scratch/home/uccaoke/Source/spack-example/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-broadwell/gcc-9.3.0/flang-20190329-ie4mhecop3a2achd4ecmzz3ja7mlfyix/lib64;/scratch/home/uccaoke/Source/spack-example/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-broadwell/gcc-9.3.0/llvm-flang-20190329-e3tkdt7bfxr6i3vaz5vozuoev356cpge/lib;/scratch/home/uccaoke/Source/spack-example/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-broadwell/gcc-9.3.0/hwloc-2.2.0-3a7dynrtd4gviwoy3rdug4yfeqmfx7bg/lib;/scratch/home/uccaoke/Source/spack-example/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-broadwell/gcc-9.3.0/libpciaccess-0.13.5-zrabhv3blezuen6f2u7ygcnd36zjghvu/lib;/scratch/home/uccaoke/Source/spack-example/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-broadwell/gcc-9.3.0/libxml2-2.9.10-disjrhzhml66h7rgd2xhghr36hovtrzq/lib;/scratch/home/uccaoke/Source/spack-example/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-broadwell/gcc-9.3.0/libiconv-1.16-q6ijt4fwluabo4kgg2cbtwuzvyscwqnv/lib;/scratch/home/uccaoke/Source/spack-example/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-broadwell/gcc-9.3.0/xz-5.2.5-lqz2e3d3yr75ozfybiv5evuj2cqgjxuz/lib;/scratch/home/uccaoke/Source/spack-example/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-broadwell/gcc-9.3.0/zlib-1.2.11-4bfingovokhjb46k463vlfh235ne2frl/lib;/scratch/home/uccaoke/Source/spack-example/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-broadwell/gcc-9.3.0/pgmath-20190329-76x7pu5bwmave7lzokzhd6yyx6sezwri/lib' '-DCMAKE_PREFIX_PATH:STRING=/scratch/home/uccaoke/Source/spack-example/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-broadwell/gcc-9.3.0/python-3.7.7-to7yawiia3pyzsoi7xv4fs74t6zukulg;/scratch/home/uccaoke/Source/spack-example/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-broadwell/gcc-9.3.0/llvm-flang-20190329-e3tkdt7bfxr6i3vaz5vozuoev356cpge;/scratch/home/uccaoke/Source/spack-example/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-broadwell/gcc-9.3.0/pgmath-20190329-76x7pu5bwmave7lzokzhd6yyx6sezwri;/scratch/home/uccaoke/Source/spack-example/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-broadwell/gcc-9.3.0/cmake-3.17.3-rvovftuse7bkwgk6o22onbpspzvfvyv2' ### Information on your system
```

<!-- Please include the output of `spack debug report` -->

* **Spack:** 0.15.1
* **Python:** 2.7.5
* **Platform:** linux-rhel7-broadwell

<!-- If you have any relevant configuration detail (custom `packages.yaml` or `modules.yaml`, etc.) you can add that here as well. -->

Our "default" GCC is an install of GCC 4.9.2 in `/shared/ucl/apps/gcc/4.9.2/`

I have a pull request https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/17480 which resolves this in a hacky way by passing the path to GCC 9.3.0's `lib64` directory through cmake.

Here is `compilers.yaml` after I've added GCC 9.3.0 from Spack to it in the second step above:

```yaml
compilers:
- compiler:
    paths:
      cc: /shared/ucl/apps/gcc/4.9.2/bin/gcc
      cxx: /shared/ucl/apps/gcc/4.9.2/bin/g++
      f77: /shared/ucl/apps/gcc/4.9.2/bin/gfortran
      fc: /shared/ucl/apps/gcc/4.9.2/bin/gfortran
    operating_system: rhel7
    target: x86_64
    modules: []
    environment: {}
    extra_rpaths: []
    flags: {}
    spec: gcc@4.9.2
- compiler:
    paths:
      cc: /usr/bin/gcc
      cxx:
      f77: /usr/bin/gfortran
      fc: /usr/bin/gfortran
    operating_system: rhel7
    target: x86_64
    modules: []
    environment: {}
    extra_rpaths: []
    flags: {}
    spec: gcc@4.8.5
- compiler:
    paths:
      cc: /scratch/home/uccaoke/Source/spack-example/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-broadwell/gcc-4.9.2/gcc-9.3.0-kpzynjjb7p6y5lsnogtwvo3c7y45x2hk/bin/gcc
      cxx: /scratch/home/uccaoke/Source/spack-example/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-broadwell/gcc-4.9.2/gcc-9.3.0-kpzynjjb7p6y5lsnogtwvo3c7y45x2hk/bin/g++
      f77: /scratch/home/uccaoke/Source/spack-example/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-broadwell/gcc-4.9.2/gcc-9.3.0-kpzynjjb7p6y5lsnogtwvo3c7y45x2hk/bin/gfortran
      fc: /scratch/home/uccaoke/Source/spack-example/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-broadwell/gcc-4.9.2/gcc-9.3.0-kpzynjjb7p6y5lsnogtwvo3c7y45x2hk/bin/gfortran
    operating_system: rhel7
    target: x86_64
    modules: []
    environment: {}
    extra_rpaths: []
    flags: {}
    spec: gcc@9.3.0
```
